Title: Palliative Care Always Specialization
Short Intro: Integrate palliative care into your daily practice. Master complex communication skills and learn tools to screen for palliative needs and offer basic palliative care.
Skills: Transition to Hospice, Palliative Care, Supportive Care, Symptom Assessment and Management, Effective Communication, Self-Care, Communication, Psychosocial Support, Goals of Care/ACP, symptom management, patient-centered care, Symptom Assessment,
